snippet: North Carolina’s voters on Tuesday approved a constitutional amendment that bans same-sex marriage, joining 29 other states and the rest of the South.
abstract: North Carolina voters overwhelmingly approve a constitutional amendment that bans same-sex marriage, joining 29 other states and the rest of the South.
lead_paragraph: North Carolina’s voters on Tuesday approved a constitutional amendment that bans same-sex marriage, joining 29 other states and the rest of the South.

headline.seo: North Carolina Votes on Same-Sex Marriage Amendment
headline.main: North Carolina Voters Pass Same-Sex Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: Ban on Gay Marriage Passes in North Carolina

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
